website_summaries.verdict: A six-piece set for ages 14 and up, it gives you a full body workout in the water.
pros: The belt keeps you upright in the water while you’re using the resistance barbells and the webbed gloves
An instructional video walks you through all the different exercises for a full range of motion workout
cons: The belt has a tendency to come loose because the buckle doesn’t hold it on tightly

customer_reviews.title: In the deep end
customer_reviews.text: Love this belt. Been aquacizing for over 10 years and tried many belts and this one is the best I've tried for balance and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: kding

customer_reviews.title: It's great for horizontal floating (snorkeling position)
customer_reviews.text: I am a slim guy with 135 pounds. I use it to help me snorkel as I am not a strong swimmer. It's great for horizontal floating (snorkeling position), and it's discreet. My only issue is that it tends to ride up a couple of inches when I am in a vertical position in the water, as I am a slim guy. I got this for $27 and when I came to write this review a week later, I see other sellers have it for $17. That was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: great belt but  not for my size
customer_reviews.text: I just wrote a review for another jogger which is better for me because of my size but wanted to also leave a good review here because this jogger is awesome as well but I am over 200lbs so it was a little small for me in the water. hmmm my head was a little low in the water some times so it was hard to breath, so I bought a pro design and paid over 50 bucks and it is better but only because of my weight. I gave this to my wife and she loves it. this is a great jogger.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: My son uses this for his deep water aquatic therapy ...
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for his deep water aquatic therapy. He is almost 4 foot tall and 70 pounds. It fits him on the smallest adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: myra wright

customer_reviews.title: Head above Water
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a product that works in keep you a float while in deep in pool. Nice slim and nice color combination. Only con it does not dry as quick at the others.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Girl

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use in my acqua fitness class. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: jinaj

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Great combo of price and performance. Very comfortable; fits well; works great for my deep water aerobics class
customer_reviews.author: shirlee

customer_reviews.title: Please make these in various weights!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because they fit in my gym bag easier than the classic dumb-bell style. I just adore them. Unlike dumb-bells you can change the action significantly by holding them flat or on edge (just like your hands). The only trouble is that I want a lot more resistance. Give us some options please!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Ergo Dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells do not provide a lot of resistance (not like the water buoys) but for those with grip issues or those that cannot manage more resistance, these will work great. They are a softer foam material that is easy to grip (the dumbbells are still rigid and maintain their shape, but the handles are softer than water buoys).
customer_reviews.author: scooterjoey

customer_reviews.title: Best float belt on the market
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this bet for water aerobics six days a week since I bought it in August 2017, almost two years. I weighed 300 pound when I bought it. It has held up, never wearing out in all that time. It’s extremely comfortable to wear. And easy to adjust even in the water. Well worth the extra few dollars over the less expensive ones. So much so that several others had purchased it over using the ones provided at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: bespeck

customer_reviews.title: Great little Set
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and saw that most of the complaints were that the belts ride up and or the end pops off the dumbbells. My friend and I did our usual hour long water aerobic session twice last week and neither of us had a problem with the dumbbells. The belts do ride up but I have used several different belts in the past and they all ride up. I have another more expensive set, $40 for belt/bells and no gloves. I only paid $50.90 for two of these sets and actually prefer them over the higher priced set! Great value for money, we are both happy and would recommend these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Ell

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands; these are easier to hold than usual dumbbells used for water aerobics. They give excellent resistance to improve workouts. They are slim and very light weight so they fit easily in the bag for my water class. Very glad I made this purchase. People in my class asked where I got them. Better price than a similar brand found on other web sites.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Alternative to road running.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I was a roadrunner for 38 years and had to stop last year or face a knee surgery and then possible replacement. My doctor was always telling me to swim,swim,swim. Well I went online few months ago to view how to run in a pool. Purchased this aqua belt and it works very well. While I wish I was still running on the road the running in the pool with this belt comes a close second. No more pounding of the knees and much less discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: lovethe music

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great option for an aquatic dumbbells!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two sets of the name brand Aqua Sphere Ergobells - I love them! They have held up well - and I really did not need another set of aquatic dumbbells. BUT blue is a favorite color of mine - and these seemed to be exactly like my beloved Aqua Sphere Ergobells. So I ordered them - and I LOVE THEM too! Definitely a great option for an aquatic dumbbells!
customer_reviews.author: LissyVA

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY I GOT THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted this as long as I've had a pool ,and could never afford it cause they were priced over $100! this one was under 50 and has everything I wanted! I make myself use it for 20 minutes a day when I go swimming.The second day i used it I could feel the muscles in my arms.The 4th day I could feel the strength in my legs!!! I LOVE THIS well made product!!! Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: LORI LEE TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Great for aquatic exercise
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to swim but would like to be able to do aquatic exercise in my pool. This belt is just what I need to help me float and maintain buoyancy so I feel safe to use my pool. With its adjustable belt and sturdy buckle, this device fits most people, slim or heavy. The foam is encased with water-resistant material so this flotation device should be quite durable. So far, having this has increased the frequency of my aquatic exercise. Delivery was prompt. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Smartsaver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits very well and does not move up in water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable grub!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable grip, light weight, & good water resistance in water aerobics. Different than the typical, weighted water dumbbells, but just as effective.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Good resistance
customer_reviews.text: They’re so light, you wouldn’t think they’d give much resistance but they’re perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Floatie Works!
customer_reviews.text: My Aqua Fitness Flotation Belt is perfect! It's adjustable and hugs your waist to keep you afloat. I use mine in water aerobics.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: The belt rides up and the ends of the weights ...
customer_reviews.text: The belt rides up and the ends of the weights come off overtime they go underwater. I will never order from this company again. I had weights from another company that sells a group of 3 different sizes and they lasted 3 years without ends ever coming off. The box blew in the pool so I am unable to return for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Berryknoll.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the lake
customer_reviews.text: Slides down small enough for my 8 year old. We use these belts in place of life jackets for experienced child swimmers at the cove and dock. more comfortable than a full vest with a margin of safety.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sloop

customer_reviews.title: Rides up. Chaffes.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I had hoped. It rides up and does not stay in your waist. There's really no way of keep it on your waistline. Once it is underwater, it slides up. If you tighten it super right, the belt chaffes and scratches. It also does not keep you afloat but rather assists in making it easier to keep you upright. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Just ok; difficult to control the water resistance.
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, but not as good as others I’ve seen. The shapes spin around on the handles so if you are trying to do controlled repetitions, they change in resistance constantly. I would not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This belt did exactly what it is supposed to do; allows deep water aerobics, water walking or running. Slides up a bit; but not as much as previous models I have had. I think the cloth material causes less slippage. Strap is very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with my purchase. use it every week in my deep water aerobics class. others in the class paid much much more for their products so I feel very lucky to have found mine at such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: ldd1995

customer_reviews.title: Added confidence
customer_reviews.text: This cannot be depended on as a life preserver, but, after decades of never swimming in deep water, I find this belt gives me just enough flotation to give me confidence in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Warren B. Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Love it! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t swim. I’m 67 and had a knee replacement. I can click this flotation belt on and jog in the deep end of the pool for a hour. It rides up my back so I have to keep it tight but that’s just a small problem. I would give this belt 10 stars if I could. My legs are very flexible. I walk faster and longer than my husband who is 3 years younger than me. It also folds so I carry it in my suitcase when we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Good Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like a good deal
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a good deal, but weights kept on falling apart in the water. Had to use guerilla glue...hopefully it will last. The belt is not as good as other belts I used. Doesn't keep me afloat compared to other belts I used before. I should have just bought the expensive products I seen at my local sports store, may have been better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have just tried putting super glue on the end caps to give them one ...
customer_reviews.text: After taking a aerobic class I couldn't wait to get this and doing aerobics and weight training at home. Upon receipt I immediately put the bar bells together and headed for the pool. On the first exercise all 4 end caps immediately fell off. After putting it back together 5 or 6 times I gave up. I have just tried putting super glue on the end caps to give them one last try. If the super glue doesn't work they are going directly into the garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My wife love them. Her only complaint she want purple.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product worked fine for 2 months but now the stitching is coming undone so for the money that I paid for this, I feel that the product should have been made better than to last just 2 months. I am updating my review as I found the packaging from this belt and contacted the manufacturer. They are mailing me anew one so I am fine with the response of their customer service department.
customer_reviews.author: don W.

customer_reviews.title: If you like fetching the pieces from the bottom of the pool, these are great!
customer_reviews.text: As many others have written, the dumbbells do not stay together. It took all of 4 seconds before my dumbbells started falling apart. The directions say to "twist and push each end-cap into the handle until it is securely in place." That's all fine and well except that the end-cap has ridges on it that look like they are meant to snap into something, BUT the dumbbells are made of (what appears to be) plain PVC pipe, which has no indents to match the ridges. If they don't align, how can you secure the end-caps into place? As soon as the dumbbells meet the resistance of the water, they fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: mickeyfan

customer_reviews.title: Great for cardio in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for exercising in the pool. I can really get my heart rate up using this to “run” laps in the pool. Very sturdy and comfortable. It does tend to slip upwards but is less annoying than using a noodle for this kind of exercise. Arrived quickly. Waist strap has a surprisingly wide range of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Mmm Dee

customer_reviews.title: Stays in Place; Has more Drag
customer_reviews.text: This stays in place better than most & I like the low profile so my arms don't rub when I'm running in the pool. Seems to add more resistance & isn't as buoyant. Not a big deal since I like being having more of my body underwater for resistance training, but if you don't like working out with just your chin out of the water, this isn't a good one for you. Not sure about durability.... will update if it becomes an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pool exercising a must
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the deep end of the pool to get my exercise and it holds me up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: J.P. Wardle

customer_reviews.title: Great resistance
customer_reviews.text: This product functions as described. They provide excellent resistance in the water. I have used them in an Aqua Fitness class. They dry quickly and are ready to put back into my gym bag. The negative that I had with them is when securing the velcro strap around the wrist, the first one is easy but I required assistance to fasten the second one. I had to use my teeth to pull off the velcro strap at the end of the class.
customer_reviews.author: Twila R.

customer_reviews.title: Not for very small waisted people
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, works well (though you need to realize that it is not a flotation devise, i.e., a life preserver or vest). It does tend to ride up, as others have commented on, but acceptable. The only real drawback is that if you are very thin, it may not be possible to tighten it enough to stay on or in place. As others have stated, you will get more exercise in the water with this than if you used a life preserver - but this would be common to all similar devises and not a drawback to this specific one. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight dumbbells for water fitness
customer_reviews.text: Love these dumbbells -- lightweight, comfortable to hold and handle. Unfortunately, I purchased these when our YMCA pool reopened temporarily and immediately closed again due to pandemic. Can't wait to get back in the water and try these babies out. I like the feel of these much better than the other dumbbells we used at the Y. Would definitely recommend. Found a YouTube video that demonstrated many useful movements I want to try.
customer_reviews.author: bbblueyes

customer_reviews.title: aqua fitness belt
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product, I tried it at the Y. in their deep water class and almost drowned. I weigh 107 lbs. and it did not hold me up. In the product review it did not say for a child. I don't get it. disappointed. Patricia Jolles
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Only for light weight people
customer_reviews.text: The belt does not hold me up out of the water completely if I don’t tread my whole face will be in the water. I weigh 170 so this may be for people that weigh 120 and under. I will use it for paddle boarding. It rides up in the water and when adjusting to tighter comes loose so I have to wrap the ends around the buckle to keep it from loosening. All in all I think I should have paid more for a better one. But will be good for a SUP.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time on this.
customer_reviews.text: This is JUNK. It needs to be redesigned. When you get the dumbbells in the water they fall apart. You might could glue them together...but, I didn't want to take a chance. The waist float device didn't work either. The water gloves were okay. Decided to just return.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I have used the water belts at my Natatorium for class and this one is just as nice. The hand weights are a great size. I have smaller hands so the gloves fit well...only draw back is I have to be very careful the velcro doesnt touch the nylon or it snags the material. I simply make sure when not in use I close the velcro and its fine to toss it into my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to work out in the pool (obviously) and they are all doing as expected. I did have to glue one of the ends, but it wasn’t a bug deal. Used Gorilla Super Glue and it has held for a month now
customer_reviews.author: SmittyE

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkeling belt
customer_reviews.text: took this belt snorkeling in the Bahamas and snorkels many times it kept me afloat for long hours in the ocean works great love this belt and I've had others but this one works best and is somewhat compact.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Baughman

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I got this to try deep water running after knee surgery, and it works great. I pull it snug around my waist and it says there and it doesn't slide as my ribs keep it there. If you're petite, this belt might be too big. I had no idea what deep water running was going to be like, but it was super easy and I'm glad this inexpensive item is helping me rehab. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Emcc

customer_reviews.title: well....
customer_reviews.text: The foam looked as though it would hold up. Unfortunately all of the parts were not in the box so I could not put the entire barbells together to test them. The gloves are great. The waist belt didn't quite stay in place for my body but try it for yourself to see - we're all shaped differently. I had to give it 3 stars because, though I couldn't use the set as described, I will be using the gloves and the foam from the barbells without the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Singingahe

customer_reviews.title: Resistance Mitts
customer_reviews.text: Super resistant. Would also like to see a "lighter" version of this type of gloves. I teach aqua fitness classes, so I like to try out new things. As I passed these around to class members, some loved the super resistance, but it was too much for others.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use these five times a week for my water aerobics classes. They are easy to hold and light to carry back and forth to the pool. They ate also a conversation starter because most people gave the dumbbell type. I’ve used those too but I like these so much more! Buy and you won’t be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bleicher

customer_reviews.title: Add to your water work out
customer_reviews.text: Gotten for resistance training Use daily as part of water aerobics /yoga Easy to hold Easy to use Used by senior citizen
customer_reviews.author: memek

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable. I have a big blue one that comes with the aquatic fitness set but it was just too big for me and rubbed under the arms. This one has a covering and is just the perfect size. I use it daily to tread water and do other aquatic exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Tina F.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Resistance
customer_reviews.text: My exercise is performed in my pool due to certain disabilities. I love having some resistance equipment to enhance my water workouts. I found that his product is helpful. I would recommend this product to a friend. In fact, now my husband wants a set too, so I must order more.
customer_reviews.author: G Flores

customer_reviews.title: Smart buy so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this belt. I'm not much of a swimmer and this lets me practice without fear. Really glad I bought it. I'm 5'5" and 155# and it's working well for me so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for lap swimming
customer_reviews.text: As an elderly person who suffers from chronic low back pain, I find that this flotation belt prevents my lumbar region from sinking (and thus causing painful lumbar extension) when I swim laps. Also, it gives me a most welcome buoyancy when I swim backstroke laps! - RB
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bloedon

customer_reviews.title: Have neuropathy and very painful on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Helped me at water aerobics keeping me off my feet. Have neuropathy and very painful on my feet. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: janice falise

customer_reviews.title: My mom loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my mom to use for water workouts as she recovers from knee replacement surgery. She loves that they are easy to grip and they are the right light resistance. Every time she uses them she calls to tell me how perfect they are for her pool workouts!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got my own for deep water aerobics because I was uncomfortable due to slippage in the water of the gym's flotation devices. Belt is attached, hence no replacement possible. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: fruity9

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This Aqua Fitness Flotation belt is fantastic! I have had many back surgeries and have Neuralgia in my legs. This belt allowed me freedom of motion to excersise in the deep end of the pool without putting pressure on my back and legs. Purchased 4 more for friends! Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fall apart
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo cheaply made. They come apart right from the start when you are working out with them. They absolutely will not stay together! So frustrating! I have others and they stay together. Do not waste your money with this company!
customer_reviews.author: N. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Discovered at a Aqua Exercise class
customer_reviews.text: A Aqua Kickboxing class I attend is where I first discovered these dumbbells'. They are so easy to use and really give the arms a good workout. After using in class I ordered for my home pool. Love them so much better than other water dumbbells.
customer_reviews.author: missmaui

customer_reviews.title: It does the job
customer_reviews.text: I’m an adult woman who’s using this for deep water aerobic exercise in my neighborhood pool. Yes, it does ride up. But I find I can tighten it quite a bit once I’m in the water and that helps a bit. For the price, you can’t beat it. Rey happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Messy Miracles

customer_reviews.title: Work well for water exercise in our swimspa.
customer_reviews.text: I only gave three stars because I had to superglue the foam dumbell head onto the handle grip. So far, the glue is holding. The foam kept flying off while we tried to exercise in the water. The webbed gloves work well for resistance and the flotation belt can also be used while using the other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to use for water exercise in the pool.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my water aerobic class. Fits perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great workout product
customer_reviews.text: I don't use these. My wife does. This is her review on my account because I bought them for her as a gift. Me: What do you think of these? Her: Product comes with an exercise booklet, which makes it easier to get into the workout. Comfortable and easy to use. You'll feel the burn quickly once you start. All my hubby needs to do now is buy me some waterproof earbuds if they exist. Me: What about functionality? Design? Fit? Her: They work. They look nice. They fit There you have it. Her review. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: One size does not fit all
customer_reviews.text: This only works if you have a long torso. It is wider than I would like. I am 5’3” and it is a bit uncomfortable when in the water. However, I had to replace my 10 year old belt. Perhaps if different sizes were offered this would be better.
customer_reviews.author: K Hayashida

customer_reviews.title: Not my faves
customer_reviews.text: These are okay. Although they are more difficult one way than the other, they are both very easy. I'd say these are for beginners. I also didn't like that I felt uneven when they're not aligned, but others may not care about that.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: There is a fair amount of resistance while using for aquatic exercise. Not bad. 4/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jan Johnson Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for my water aerobics class. I tightened this belt as far as it would go, but it kept riding up under my armpits. Very uncomfortable. So I’m very unhappy with this purchase and wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our lake. They are NOT an approved life saving device but I feel more comfortable with my teenager using these instead of nothing in the lake because it would be hrs to sink like a rock while wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: TracieT

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I just haven’t figured out the best way to utilize the weights but they provide zero water resistance and seem to come apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: levi

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable as won’t stay in place
customer_reviews.text: The belt won’t stay in place even at the tightest setting. It rides all the way up under my arms and not comfortable. It’s ok if you just want to use it as a flotation device. The weights were good for a few uses but then the ends keep popping off making them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Weber George

customer_reviews.title: Good for lite resistance workout
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept but I've used others water resistant weights with much better resistance. These have very little resistance best for beginner and I do recommend them for a light workout. Just not for me..
customer_reviews.author: Maryah

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and compact
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Flat and easy to pack and with which to travel. The grip is just right for the average adult hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Mosher

customer_reviews.title: The ends come off during exercise. Not a good thing
customer_reviews.text: This set is great as far as the belt is concerned. The weights themselves come apart at the end when using in the water. It needs to be made where it can be locked in place so that the end doesn’t come flying off during an exercise. I don’t feel hat it’s consumers responsibility to have to glue or adhere the end on after purchasing. Unfortunately it kinda defeats the purpose of the hand weights when they have to be altered or fixed. Otherwise this would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, affordable,  and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Fits and works as described. I really like combining deep water aerobics with shallow water aerobics by using my belt. Allows you to focus on the exercise more than keeping your head above water.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Quilt

customer_reviews.title: Used as a snorkel float
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a snorkel float when worn across your stomach, but you do need to wear a rash guard under it. The protective cover is a little scratcy, but should make the belt last longer than our previous aqua joggers, which the foam started breaking off from after a few trips.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my interval training app and walk/jog all over my pool. It is perfect! It’s also comfortable and stays in place. I also use this as a “kickboard” for a different kind of leg workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold onto & very light weight; Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love how easy these are to old onto in the water. I have not only been working my arms, but also my legs by holding them with my toes. Seem to be very well made and they are super light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanni Boyce

customer_reviews.title: The purpose is to keep moving. I swim across a lake and was able to rest at times.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent to keep you afloat, but is not a flotation device.
customer_reviews.author: Handyboy

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for the price and all-around great. De-stress on your forearms or hand is way less than lifting weights. As hard as you want to push against the water you get resistance back.
customer_reviews.author: JoeSharAZ

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy...total disappointment, no use for them at all!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The worst product I could have bought......The dumbbells come apart the second you put them in the water. The pieces don't come together with enough pressure. The holes are too big for the bar to hold it together. Just terrible. I have no use for them A total disappointment. The quality of the material is bad....iI should have known because of the price, please don't bother buying it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dsp

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be thicker to hold my weight up?!
customer_reviews.text: Belt fit fine and held me up but not as easy to stay up as my previous sold out belt. My weight is the reason I’m using it to run in water(220) but this isn’t as bouynt as the larger float I’ve used in the past. If your under 200-190 your probably fine with it?
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mogensen

customer_reviews.title: fits like a charm
customer_reviews.text: My local YMCA opened several weeks ago finally but because of COVID we weren't allowed to use weights or belts belonging to the Y for water walking. I thought because of all the chlorine it wouldn't be a problem, but it was. I was forced to purchase my own which is working out perfect. My only problem now is they won't allow me to rent a locker so I have to lug them back and forth. I guess it's a small inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Just surviving the winter

customer_reviews.title: Not very satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: The dumbell design is silly - the end caps which are supposed to hold the foam disks in place fell out as soon as I tried to use them. They have no friction or screw fastening to hold them in place. I had to glue them in and have not tried them to see if they will hold. I have average size hands and the gloves are too small and are difficult to get on and off. The floatation belt is fine. They fell apart after gluing with Gorilla glue Next will try using plumbers glue for PVC pipe; the purple primer and the glue method'This product is useless as sold
customer_reviews.author: frank kutlak

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up an adult
customer_reviews.text: I weight 205 lbs and I am a sinker but this felt like I was wearing a normal belt. Didn't help keep me floating at all.
customer_reviews.author: Alaboard

customer_reviews.title: Dumbbells are the weakest part
customer_reviews.text: They work fine but you have to be careful with the dumbbells. Ours began to fall apart fairly quickly and you have to be gentle or the come apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: AJBeastro

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: Cant wait to use this in my deep water aerobics/aqua jogging class! Came promptly, no damage to item, lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl saltkill

customer_reviews.title: High quality piece at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for Deepwater exercising or kayaking I'm a small woman and on the smallest strap setting it fits me fine I'm 5 2 + 120 lb any smaller and it would be too big by in the children's Department
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product was poor. The water dumbbells fell apart the first time I tried to use them. The end caps won’t stay on. Makes them totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: Carole K

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a snorkel trip to help support my chest and prevent my neck from hurting. It was not useful for this purpose. However my boyfriend used it as it was designed around his waist and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: human

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells ends pop off as you try to workout. Tried to glue ends on but with force of water did not hold. I DO NOT recommend this product! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Mom loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom who has bone pain so that she could workout and build strength in the pool. She loves them! They're nice and easier to use than those bulky weights you see online. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: First time I used it, one of the floats broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought just the belt and one of the floats broke before I even got in the water. The belt seemed comfortable and was definitely light weight. I'm not sure if the design is bad, or the quality of materials is bad, but something isn't right.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Need hand floats.
customer_reviews.text: This keeps me upright over my mouth unless I tread with my arms. Photos show people using hand floats to stay higher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not like
customer_reviews.text: I weigh under 150lbs. and this belt is useless for water aerobics. I was hoping it would have much more buoyancy so that I could do more kicks in deep water.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not buoyant enough.
customer_reviews.text: This belt was not buoyant enough to perform the way I needed it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dumbells Come Apart
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with dumbbells. The instructions are clear and easy, however, the black plastic end caps do not lock securely and pop off with the slightest pressure. The black plastic end caps have ridges; however the padded dumbbell handles do not have corresponding ridges. They do not snap securely and therefore cannot be used in or underwater
customer_reviews.author: M. Oconnor

customer_reviews.title: You'll need a rash guard while wearing this!
customer_reviews.text: This works well in the pool and is a great price. The only complaint I have is the cover is very abrasive. You really need to wear a rash guard while wearing this, otherwise you'll get skin burn.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Worst product I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: If I could do a few negative stars, I'd do them, as it doesn't even deserve a single star. The barbells fell apart on the second usage. Sooooo..I paid 33 bucks for a pair of gloves thatI could have purchased for 10 dollars. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: ecd

customer_reviews.title: Work great for pool exercises
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts, but these have proved to be perfect for my pool workouts. Sturdy and just enough resistance for arm aerobics. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Revrags

product_meta.title: New & Improved AQUA 6 Piece Fitness Set for Water Aerobics, Pool Exercise Equipment, Aquatic Swim Belt, Resistance Gloves, Barbells, Model:AF4730
product_meta.description:
Style: Deluxe 6-Piece Fitness SetAqua Fitness is proven to be a low-impact with high results workout: ideal for strength training, cardio endurance, and burning calories. The Aqua Fitness Training System features 6 essential pieces: comfortable floatation belt, 2 resistance dumbbells, 2 webbed gloves, and 12-workout instruction guide. All aquatic equipment is chlorine resistant. Recommended for ages 14 and up. Contoured design, fits securely around torso - one size fits all. Suspends your body vertically in shallow or deep water Suitable for all fitness levels; Twelve (12) workout instruction guide. Low-stress, high-results workout Chlorine resistant, EVA foam Recommended for ages 14 and upWARNING: This is not a life-saving device. NEVER leave children unattended while device is in use. Always consult with a physician before beginning any exercise program. CARE AND MAINTENANCE: -Rinse with clean water after use and dry completely. -Do not allow products to be exposed to direct sunlight for long periods of time. -Store in a cool, dry placeMITTED TO CUSTOMER SATISFACTION: LIMITED – Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal. That’s why all Aqua-Leisure products carry our performance . Fabric colors may fade if frequently used in high chlorine-salt-bromine chemically treated pool water or ocean-water. More importantly, commercial pools are much higher in chlorine, salt and bromine levels than your average home residential pool. Product color and graphics may vary from those pictured. For service or more information, email Aqua-Leisure Industries, at customercare@aqualeisure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Aqua Fitness Excercise Set from Aqua Leisure is a great way to get in shape and to start your aquatic fitness plan. The belt is engineered in a way that will keep you upright and vertical while in the pool. You will have the balance to be able to perform all of the excercises the included guide has to offer. The belt and barbells are durable and flexible enough for the hardest of workouts. They're comfortable enough for light workouts and is also ideal for many physical therapy plans. The Aqua Fitness Excercise Set from Aqua Leisure is a versatile, comfortable and best of all leads to great fitness results.
feature_bullets: IMPROVE MUSCLE TONE AND CARDIO: Fabric covered Foam Flotation Swim Belt provides “Neutral Buoyancy” around your torso and is optimized for balance and safety in shallow or deep water.
LOW IMPACT WATER EXERCISE: experience less stressful pool workouts alleviating stress on your joints. Great for rehabilitation therapy, too!
FOAM FLOATATION BELT: Soft foam, contoured swim belt designed for less irritation with adjustable strap and buckle for a custom fit. One size fits all.
IMPROVED DUMBELLS & DURABLE MATERIALS: Chlorine-resistant EVA foam, web straps, and plastic buckles; Improved Dumbells 2020.
VARIABLE RESISTANCE LEVELS: AQUA Fitness equipment creates variable resistance levels in the water as you move through full range of motion to tone your arms, shoulders and upper body.
AQUATIC FITNESS COMBO SET: Six (6) Piece Set makes water Aerobics and Pool Exercise your gym with the intelligent low-impact workout.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
